root: ^Folkvar. I had so much hope for you.
^Father? What are you doing? How long have these people been enslaved?
^Hahaa Since before your time, son. I've been building something while you've been hiding in the castle.
^Ahh what have you done? Who are you?
^I am... More powerful than ever before!

Netrixi_approaches_Moke: ^I have mastered Beholderite weapons crafting! Through stabilizing the compound, I have achieved infinite energy!
Folkvar_approaches_Moke: ^I did this to protect the family. You couldn't understand. You weren't there to see the chaos. The danger.
Family_history: ^Ah yes, I believe you had a run-in with your brother earlier. I wish your mother was here to see it...
^but she just couldn't see that what I was doing was best for the family legacy.
^Maybe we can knock some sense into you
Folkvar_challenges_Moke: ^At this point, son, you should to recognize when it's time to take as much as you can for yourself. Grow up.
^Maybe we can knock some sense into you
Iv_approaches_Moke: ^And it looks like you've brought another monk for me to enslave! Good. The monks typically last longer.
^We are peaceful! Why kidnap my brother?
Moke_explains_Iv: ^Exactly. I knew he wouldn't betray me. It's hard to find people who I can trust.
Moke_breaks_Bo: ^Maybe he isn't as pure as you thought he was.
Moke_explains_Netrixi: ^My Kingdom has crumbled. I am no longer the king here, Beholderite is.
^It is you who has become the slave
